sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EmailSettings } from 'src/models/emailSettings'; import { EmailSettingsService } from 'src/services/emailSettings.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inputs-block', templateUrl: './inputs-block.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inputs-block.component.scss'] }) export class InputsBlockComponent implements OnInit { emailSettings: EmailSettings = { intervalValue: 0, startTime: 0, endTime:0, periodicity: '', daysOfWeek: [] }; constructor(private emailSettingService: EmailSettingsService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.emailSettingService.getGeneralProperties().subscribe({ next: (response: any) => { this.emailSettings = response.data }, error: error => console.log(error) }); } }
